column5: I'm flying into NW Ont. for the opener, 70 miles north of Red Lake. I won't know about ice out until Monday, supposed to call for update Mon. afternoon. With ice out this late the pike should be easy to find in the shallows. Will the eyes still be on shallow structue spawning.

The eyes will definatley still be in shallow... the late ice break usually means a later spawn. I would guess they're finishing up their spawn right now, and will stay on the beaches/shallows for the next few weeks. Probably until the first part of June.
